Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insights ][Closest Approach Time Report]Open Closest Approach Report Page
Description: Test case to verify successful navigation and loading of Closest Approach Time Report page in GPS Manager GPS Insights
Precondition: 1. User is logged in; 2. GPS Manager is accessible; 3. GPS Insights section is available
Steps: 1. Navigate to GPS Manager GPS Insights section; 2. Locate Closest Approach Time Report option; 3. Click on Closest Approach Time Report link; 4. Wait for page to load completely; 5. Verify page title displays correctly; 6. Confirm all report elements are visible; 7. Verify report is ready for configuration
Expected Result: 1. GPS Manager GPS Insights section is accessible; 2. Closest Approach Time Report option is visible; 3. Report page navigation completes successfully; 4. Page loads without errors; 5. Page title displays Closest Approach Time Report; 6. All report configuration elements are visible; 7. Report interface is ready for user interaction

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insights ][Closest Approach Time Report]Set From Date
Description: Test case to verify date picker functionality for setting start date in Closest Approach Time Report
Precondition: 1. Page loaded; 2. Date picker is accessible; 3. User has date selection permissions
Steps: 1. Locate the From Date field in the report interface; 2. Click on the year field to open date picker; 3. Select year 2025 from the year dropdown; 4. Navigate to January month selection; 5. Select day 1 from the calendar; 6. Verify selected date is displayed correctly; 7. Click done to confirm date selection
Expected Result: 1. From Date field is visible and accessible; 2. Date picker opens successfully when year field is clicked; 3. Year 2025 is selected and displayed correctly; 4. January month is accessible for selection; 5. Day 1 is selected and highlighted; 6. Selected date 1-Jan-25 is displayed in the field; 7. Date selection is confirmed and picker closes

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insights ][Closest Approach Time Report]Set To Date
Description: Test case to verify date picker functionality for setting end date in Closest Approach Time Report
Precondition: 1. From date selected; 2. Date picker is accessible; 3. User has date selection permissions
Steps: 1. Locate the To Date field in the report interface; 2. Click on the year field to open date picker; 3. Select year 2025 from the year dropdown; 4. Navigate to January month selection; 5. Select day 3 from the calendar; 6. Verify selected date is displayed correctly; 7. Click done to confirm date selection
Expected Result: 1. To Date field is visible and accessible; 2. Date picker opens successfully when year field is clicked; 3. Year 2025 is selected and displayed correctly; 4. January month is accessible for selection; 5. Day 3 is selected and highlighted; 6. Selected date 3-Jan-25 is displayed in the field; 7. Date selection is confirmed and picker closes

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insights ][Closest Approach Time Report]Select Vehicles
Description: Test case to verify vehicle selection functionality in Closest Approach Time Report filters
Precondition: 1. Date range set; 2. Vehicle selection is accessible; 3. Vehicles CAO-8070 and VEH-3500 exist in system
Steps: 1. Locate the vehicle selection field in the report interface; 2. Click on vehicle selection dropdown or field; 3. Search for vehicle CAO-8070 in the selection list; 4. Select CAO-8070 from the results; 5. Search for vehicle VEH-3500 in the selection list; 6. Select VEH-3500 from the results; 7. Verify both vehicles appear in filter selection
Expected Result: 1. Vehicle selection field is visible and accessible; 2. Vehicle selection interface opens successfully; 3. CAO-8070 is found and available for selection; 4. CAO-8070 is selected and added to filter; 5. VEH-3500 is found and available for selection; 6. VEH-3500 is selected and added to filter; 7. Both vehicles appear in filter selection correctly

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insights ][Closest Approach Time Report]Select Geofence
Description: Test case to verify geofence selection functionality in Closest Approach Time Report filters
Precondition: 1. Vehicles selected; 2. Geofence selection is accessible; 3. Geofence Welipenna Interchange exists in system
Steps: 1. Locate the geofence selection field in the report interface; 2. Click on geofence selection dropdown or field; 3. Search for geofence Welipenna Interchange Welipenna Exit Sri Lanka; 4. Verify geofence name is displayed correctly; 5. Select the geofence from the results; 6. Confirm geofence is added to filter; 7. Verify geofence appears in selected filters
Expected Result: 1. Geofence selection field is visible and accessible; 2. Geofence selection interface opens successfully; 3. Welipenna Interchange Welipenna Exit Sri Lanka is found; 4. Geofence name is displayed correctly in search results; 5. Geofence is selected successfully; 6. Geofence is added to filter selection; 7. Geofence appears in selected filters correctly

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insights ][Closest Approach Time Report]Execute Search
Description: Test case to verify search execution functionality in Closest Approach Time Report
Precondition: 1. Filters selected; 2. Search button is accessible; 3. Valid search criteria are configured
Steps: 1. Verify all required filters are properly configured; 2. Locate the Search button in the report interface; 3. Confirm Search button is enabled and clickable; 4. Click on Search button to execute report; 5. Wait for search processing to complete; 6. Verify search results begin to load; 7. Confirm table displays closest approach time and location data
Expected Result: 1. All required filters are properly configured and visible; 2. Search button is visible and accessible in interface; 3. Search button is enabled and ready for interaction; 4. Search action is triggered successfully; 5. Search processing completes without errors; 6. Search results begin to load in table; 7. Table displays closest approach time and location data correctly

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insights ][Closest Approach Time Report]Pagination Display
Description: Test case to verify pagination functionality in Closest Approach Time Report results
Precondition: 1. Search results shown; 2. Pagination controls are accessible; 3. Multiple result pages exist
Steps: 1. Locate pagination controls in the report results area; 2. Verify current page information is displayed; 3. Check if multiple pages of results exist; 4. Navigate to next page if available; 5. Navigate to previous page if available; 6. Verify page navigation works correctly; 7. Confirm each vehicle shows 1 row per result page
Expected Result: 1. Pagination controls are visible and accessible; 2. Current page information is displayed correctly; 3. Multiple pages of results are available if data exceeds page limit; 4. Next page navigation works correctly; 5. Previous page navigation works correctly; 6. Page navigation functions without errors; 7. Each vehicle displays 1 row per result page as expected

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insights ][Closest Approach Time Report]Validate Closest Approach Data
Description: Test case to verify data structure and completeness in Closest Approach Time Report results
Precondition: 1. Report loaded; 2. Data table is visible; 3. Results contain expected information
Steps: 1. Review the data table structure in the report results; 2. Verify Vehicle column contains correct vehicle information; 3. Check Geo Fence Name column displays geofence details; 4. Confirm Closest Time column shows timestamp data; 5. Validate Distance column contains measurement values; 6. Verify Location column displays coordinate information; 7. Confirm all required data columns are present and populated
Expected Result: 1. Data table structure is properly formatted and visible; 2. Vehicle column displays correct vehicle information for each row; 3. Geo Fence Name column shows accurate geofence details; 4. Closest Time column contains valid timestamp data; 5. Distance column displays accurate measurement values; 6. Location column shows proper coordinate information; 7. All required data columns are present and populated with valid data

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insights ][Closest Approach Time Report]Match UI and Data Export
Description: Test case to verify data consistency between UI display and exported/downloaded data in Closest Approach Time Report
Precondition: 1. Export/download enabled; 2. UI data is visible; 3. Export functionality is accessible
Steps: 1. Locate export or download functionality in the report interface; 2. Verify export options are available and accessible; 3. Execute export/download action for current results; 4. Open downloaded file in appropriate application; 5. Compare UI table data with exported file data; 6. Verify all row values match exactly; 7. Confirm data consistency between UI and export
Expected Result: 1. Export/download functionality is visible and accessible; 2. Export options are available for current report results; 3. Export/download action completes successfully; 4. Downloaded file opens correctly in application; 5. UI table data can be compared with exported data; 6. All row values match exactly between UI and export; 7. Complete data consistency confirmed between UI and exported file
